properties.areaDesc: Independence, AR; White, AR; Monroe, AR; Prairie, AR; Jackson, AR; Woodruff, AR
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 1:49AM CST until January 11 at 2:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
At 148 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from Swifton to near Grubbs to near McFadden to McCrory to
8 miles northeast of Fredonia, moving east at 40 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

Locations impacted include...
Newport...                        Brinkley...
Augusta...                        Des Arc...
Hazen...                          Tuckerman...
Diaz...                           Swifton...
Patterson...                      Grubbs...
Fredonia...                       Russell...
Jacksonport...                    Tupelo...
Hunter...                         Algoa...
Alfrey...                         Allendale...
McCrory...                        McFadden...

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 40 between mile markers 191 and 219.
US Highway 67 between mile markers 57 and 101.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for eastern and
central Arkansas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and flash
flooding may occur. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.

NWSheadline: A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CST FOR WOODRUFF...EASTERN INDEPENDENCE...NORTHEASTERN PRAIRIE... JACKSON...NORTHWESTERN MONROE AND EASTERN WHITE COUNTIES
